reviews.text:
Subject: Reimbursement Tool – Initial Thoughts & Scope Overview

Hey team,

Thanks again for jumping on this!
reviews.reason_text: This is an introduction and not a requirement.

reviews.text: Here’s a rough overview of what we’re looking to build for Reimbursely’s new expense reimbursement platform.
reviews.reason_text: This is an overview of the project and not a requirement.

reviews.text: We’re aiming to simplify the messy, manual process employees currently go through with spreadsheets and email approvals.
reviews.reason_text: This is about simplifying an existing process and not a requirement.

reviews.text:
Vision
We want a simple, mobile-friendly tool that automates out-of-pocket expense claims, approvals, and reimbursements—while staying fully compliant with EU tax rules, GDPR, and ISO‑27001 standards.
reviews.reason_text: This is a vision statement setting the scope and not enforcing any behavior.

reviews.text:
User Roles
	•	Employees: Upload receipts (photo or PDF), fill basic details, submit.
	•	Finance Managers: Review and approve claims, flag policy issues.
	•	Auditors: View a read-only log of approvals, payouts, and receipts.
reviews.reason_text: This describes user roles but doesn't enforce behavior.

reviews.text:
Core Functional Requirements
	•	Receipt upload (drag & drop, phone camera).
reviews.reason_text: Receipt upload functionality is a core requirement.

reviews.text:
•	OCR auto-fill for merchant, date, and amount.
	•	Real-time policy checks (e.g. taxi limit is €50/day).
reviews.reason_text: OCR features and policy checks are specific functionalities requiring enforcement.

reviews.text:
•	Multi-currency support with auto-conversion.
	•	Slack notifications for claim status.
reviews.reason_text: Multi-currency support with notifications is a performance requirement.
Instant VAT suggestions need to comply with tax rules.

reviews.text:
Non-Functional & Compliance
	•	Full audit trail on every action.
reviews.reason_text: Full audit trail is a system constraint to enforce behavior.

reviews.text: •	All data encrypted at rest and in transit.
reviews.reason_text: Data encryption is a security measure requirement.

reviews.text: •	GDPR consent flow and data export/deletion options.
reviews.reason_text: GDPR consent flow is required for compliance.
Hosting in an EU region is a security requirement.

reviews.text:
Open Questions
	•	Should managers get email or Slack alerts by default?
reviews.reason_text: Managers getting alerts by default is a system behavior.

reviews.text:
•	Do we need integrations with accounting tools from MVP?

Let me know what’s missing!
—Lena
reviews.reason_text: This is more of a question seeking features rather than enforcing behavior.
